${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.NAME: Amalgamate Waters
${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.DESCRIPTION: 抽 a ${ModID}:Mutable card. NL 获得 ${ModID}:Mutable effects from any number of 牌 in your hand, then ${ModID}:Transmute them。
${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! ${ModID}:Mutable 张牌。 NL 获得 ${ModID}:Mutable effects from any number of 牌 in your hand, then ${ModID}:Transmute them。

${ModID}:CrystalLattice.NAME: Crystal Lattice
${ModID}:CrystalLattice.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Transmute 一张牌。 Add !M! additional copies of the new card 加入手牌。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CrystalResonance.NAME: Crystal Resonance
${ModID}:CrystalResonance.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you ${ModID}:Transmute, 获得 !M! 点 力量 。

${ModID}:Drench.NAME: Drench
${ModID}:Drench.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: 造成 !D! 点伤害。

${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.NAME: Frozen Capsule
${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, 抽一张牌。
${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
${ModID}:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: Free to play. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: ${ModID}:Transmute this card. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: Shuffle this card into your 抽牌堆。
${ModID}:GhostlyMist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL ${ModID}:Mutable: Free to play. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: ${ModID}:Transmute this card. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: Shuffle this card into your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.NAME: Glacial Synthesis
${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute 一张牌。
${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute up to !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.NAME: Searing Synthesis
${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute 一张牌。
${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute up to !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:ViscousShell.NAME: Viscous Shell
${ModID}:ViscousShell.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Transmute this card。

${ModID}:DimensionalIcicles.NAME: Dimensional Icicles
${ModID}:DimensionalIcicles.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 !B! times. The number of hits is affected by 格挡 modifiers。

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle this card into your 抽牌堆。
